title: Is selling books books online a good idea? - Quora

response.answer_text: …yes it is!! and why not? you get the books for a discount, whenever you want to buy it, you get it for a discount and when you go to the shops, its either over priced or they don’t have it and it’s also easily accessible to everyone around the country and across the world. So, i do believe, selling books online, is a good idea! Best of luck!
